alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 11:44PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jasper, eastern Simpson and Smith Counties through 1230 AM CST... At 1144 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Magee, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Raleigh and Center Ridge around 1200 AM CST. Bay Springs around 1215 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sylvarena, Mize, Montrose and Louin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
